name: Access eforms
tag_list: electronic-medical-record-software, emr, automated-registration, paperless-hospital-registration, bar-coding-forms, document-management, online-forms, electronic-signature, electronic-forms-automation-and-management, green-and-sustainable-hospital, disast
overview:
For more than 10 years, Access has been providing technology solutions that create automated and paperless forms management processes. Hundreds of healthcare organizations worldwide trust Access to provide industry-leading, cost-effective, user-friendly forms solutions that add value to existing technology and deliver early and lasting return on investment. Access products solve problems for clinical and business areas of the healthcare enterprise, whether they’re deployed at a small regional hospital or a nationwide IDN with hundreds of facilities.

With an Access solution in place, administrative and clinical staff alike have instant access to pertinent forms from anywhere in the hospital. Rather than wasting time dealing with hard copies they focus on delivering quality care and completing daily tasks faster than ever before. From admissions and HIM, to human resources, materials management and finance, Access solutions deliver new levels of efficiency.
